title: Apple pie muffins
ingredients: ['Muffins', '275g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '240ml buttermilk', '120g butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g soft brown sugar', '225g diced apples', 'Topping', '100g soft brown sugar', '40g plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons butter, melted']
